Virgil Tibbs.action: Approaches Mama Caleba calmly and attempts to gather information about the man paying for Delores Purdy's abortion.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Asks Mama for a name so he can go home and rest, pleading sincerely and showing concern for her well-being by saying 'Please, Mama, hear me! Don't make me have to send you to jail!'

Virgil Tibbs.action: Promises Mama he won't take away her understanding or the better life she has gotten used to.
Virgil Tibbs.assessment: This promise shows Tibbs's respect for Mama's feelings and his intention to be supportive and considerate, which is a positive indicator of warmth.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Pursues Delores after she runs out in panic, showing concern and a protective instinct.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Firmly insists on getting a name to resolve the situation, despite tension and resistance.
Virgil Tibbs.assessment: This shows Tibbs's determination and focus on gathering necessary information, reflecting his professional approach and confidence under pressure.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Explains the difference between jail time for colored people and others, emphasizing the seriousness of the situation.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Promises not to take away the woman's improved lifestyle if she cooperates.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Slows down when he sees Ralph holding the girl with a pistol pointed at him, assessing the situation calmly.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Engages in a verbal confrontation with Purdy and the white toughs, confidently challenging their assumptions and directing attention to evidence (the money in the purse).

Virgil Tibbs.action: Identifies Ralph as having manipulated the group and exposes the truth about the money and the abortion.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Instantaneously moves to disarm Ralph during a violent confrontation, locking his gun hand painfully and forcing him to drop the weapon.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Scoops up Ralph's revolver and holds it with a manner that conveys quiet authority.

Virgil Tibbs.action: Calls out calmly and clearly for Mama Caleba to call a doctor after the shooting incident.
